Package controllers

Class CreateNewTest2Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.Controller
      • controllers.CreateNewTest2Controller
  • public class CreateNewTest2Controller
extends Controller
    Controller for the /create_new_test_2 page. This page shows the test (with answers) and allows the teacher to select regions of the pages to be test questions. It also allows the teacher to assign point values to each question.

    • Field Detail

      • gson

        private static com.google.gson.Gson gson
        This uses the Google Gson library to decode JSON. To reduce overhead, we only create one Gson object per controller.

      • serveCreateNewTest2PageGet

        public static spark.Route serveCreateNewTest2PageGet
        Handle GET requests to /create_new_test_2. This handler shows the user interface that allows the teacher to create test questions. The GET request must have the following parameters:
        • test_id: The ID number (from the database) of the test that questions are being created for.

      • serveCreateNewTest2PagePost

        public static spark.Route serveCreateNewTest2PagePost
        Handle POST requests submitting the form to /create_new_test_2. This saves all test questions that the teacher created to the database. The POST request must have the following parameters:
        • test_id - The ID number (from the database) of the test for which questions are being created.
        • test_questions_json - A JSON string of all of the questions that the user created. This will be a JSON array of TestQuestion objects (defined in src/main/resources/static/scripts/typescript/testquestion.ts and in src/main/java/storage/TestQuestion.java).

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateNewTest2Controller

        public CreateNewTest2Controller​(PersistentStorage persistentStorage)
        Construct a new controller with the given PersistentStorage.
        Parameters:
        persistentStorage - A PersistentStorage object shared between all controllers and used to store permanent data.
